name: Scheduled Task WScript VBScript
description: Detects specific process parameters as used by ACTINIUM scheduled task persistence creation.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*schtasks* AND process.command_line:*create* AND process.command_line:*wscript* AND process.command_line:*e\:vbscript*)`
